scripts.build:ui: rmdir build /S /Q && cd ../../part2/phonebook && npm run build --prod && xcopy .\build "..\..\part3\phonebook backend\build" /i /E
scripts.deploy: cd ../.. && git subtree push --prefix "part3/phonebook backend" heroku master
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m "uibuild" && git push && npm run deploy
